task.title: Send audiences to solutions
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how to send audiences to a solution. Sending audience segments to Analytics lets you see in reporting the audiences to which visitors belong. Audience membership is appended to an audience management hit. The audience is shared with a selected reports suite, using the ListVar.

step.cmd: On the Audience Library page, select one or more audiences.
On the Send Audience page, select the destination.

info.p: If you choose Analytics, select one or more report suites.
